alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 9:46AM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Nye, west central White Pine and southeastern Eureka Counties through 1015 AM PDT... At 945 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 23 miles south of Pinto Summit, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pinto Summit and Pancake Summit. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Nye County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; White Pine County
